Lower trading fees for maker orders and stablecoins
We are lowering maker fees for our clients and separating fee tiers for a more competitive crypto experience
We’re launching the new FIX API interface
The new interface further improves connectivity to the core Bitstamp trading infrastructure.
Scheduled maintenance: Wednesday, December 7, 2022, at 8 AM UTC
Due to scheduled upgrades, all Bitstamp services will be temporarily unavailable
We’re listing Shiba Inu (SHIB) in the USA
Bitstamp lists SHIB in the US – the token behind the popular Shiba Inu project.
Bitstamp Expands Bitstamp as a Service Offering
We’ve expanded our Bitstamp as a Service offering - an on-demand solution that allows institutions to onboard their clients into crypto, giving them exposure to Bitcoin and other digital assets.
PayPal is now available on Bitstamp
Bitstamp launches PayPal as the latest payment method for fast and simple crypto purchases.
Bitstamp Post-Trade Settlement - Trade now, Settle later
Trade with Bitstamp Post-Trade Settlement and avoid needing to prefund your account.
Bitstamp now offers Over the Counter (OTC) trading
Bitstamp now offers Over the Counter (OTC) trading. You can now trade large amounts of crypto easily at the best possible price with seamless, private and instant block trade execution.
Bitstamp now supports Apple Pay and Google Pay - Summer of Discovery

Today we’re happy to announce that you can buy crypto easier and faster via your Apple Pay® and Google Pay® wallets in your Bitstamp App. Buying any coin or token on Bitstamp now takes seconds from start to end - all in one place!
Bitstamp’s Summer of Discovery is underway with 0% trading fee for all coins!*
Bitstamp kicks off the Summer of Discovery with 0% trading fee for all coins.*
